Medical Records Blockchain Project Meeti.technical_decisions: Implementing multi-factor authentication, encryption of data both at rest and in transit, and exploring the use of smart contracts for compliance checks.
Medical Records Blockchain Project Meeti.fhir_integration_approach: Interoperability with existing healthcare applications and compliance with healthcare standards.
Medical Records Blockchain Project Meeti.hipaa_compliance_strategy: Regular security audits to ensure compliance with healthcare standards and robust data security measures.
Medical Records Blockchain Project Meeti.risks_and_concerns: Ensuring team expertise for smart contracts and integration of security measures with existing systems.
Medical Records Blockchain Project Meeti.next_steps: Finalize the FAQ document and prepare training materials.
